p: The ratio between the crystalline area in the XRD diffraction pattern and total area in the diffraction pattern determines the relative crystallinity of the starch ( Nara and Komiya, 1983). Based on the result of TOPAS Version 4.2 XRD data analysis program, the relative crystallinity of the starch isolated from DFPLA was found to be 32.18 %. This relative crystallinity is within the range of natural starches, specifically 15â€“45% ( Zobel, 1988).
